```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
IV <- read_excel("/Users/cande/Desktop/Fall21/Advanced Data Science/KA_CT_project/Index_IV_Data_collection.xlsx",col_types = c("text", "numeric", "numeric", 
        "numeric", "numeric", "numeric", 
        "numeric", "numeric", "numeric", 
        "numeric"))
```

```{r}
table(IV$`Talent Competitiveness Ranking (IMD)`)
```

```{r}
IV_ranked<-IV %>% 
  mutate(across(c(`PISA Math (2018)`,`PISA Science (2018)`,`PISA Reading (2018)`,`Quality of Education System (CEOWORLD)`, `Opportunity [in education] (CEOWORLD)`,`Talent Competitiveness Ranking (IMD)`),
    ~min_rank(.x)))

```

```{r}
IV_indexed<- IV_ranked %>% 
  mutate(IV_Edu_prior_index= `PISA Math (2018)`+
           `PISA Science (2018)`+
           `PISA Reading (2018)`+
           `Quality of Education System (CEOWORLD)`+
           `Opportunity [in education] (CEOWORLD)`+
           `Talent Competitiveness Ranking (IMD)`)
```


#Write new data set 

```{r}
library(writexl)
```

```{r}
write.csv(IV_indexed,"ADS_project_data_IV.csv")
write_xlsx(IV_indexed,"ADS_project_data_IV.xlsx")
```
